name: INVADICE
description:
This is a real-time turn-based action game.
Shoot and defeat the approaching enemies, collect stars and become stronger!
Dice are loaded into the gun and fired to make a strong shot.

INSTRUCTION

  1. Dice:
    Player's shot can deal only 1 damage. But you can consume dice up to 3 for make more damage of shoot. Sum of dice append to damage.
    Plant enemy drops 1 dice. If killing beam boll in the turn it beams, it drops 6 dice.
     
  2. Skill Stars:
    Green box enemy drops a random-colored skill star item. Picking up skill star item, it is placed in the place under the dice-sum-meter corresponds to remaining dice.
    (i.e.  If you pick up blue star item and have 6 dice, then blue skill star is placed in the upper right gauge, sixth from the left and below it.)
    If you take a skill star item when you do not have the dice, you will receive 6 dice.
     
  3. Use Skills
    If the sum of the dice rolls is equal to the position where the skill star is placed, the corresponding skill is activated.
    1. White Skill  - 999 Damage!!
    2. Red Skill  - Shoots penetrating lasers
    3. Blue Skill - Become invincible for 3 turns
    4. Green Skill - Pick up all items (dice & life)
